org.vaniglia.parser
Class Parser

java.lang.Object
  org.vaniglia.parser.Parser
public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object

This is a parser for Token Speratated Values (TSV) file. The format of the records in the file is defined via the RecordType.

Constant Field Values

recoveryFileExtention

See Also:
Constant Field Values

token

private char token
Default token = comma. The token is the fields separator.

comment

private char comment
Default comment = hash. The comment starting char for comment lines.

recovery

private int recovery
Number of record between two update on the positions file. If set to 0 or less, the positions file will not be used.

flush

private boolean flush

recordType

private RecordType recordType
The record type for the file to parse.

filename

private java.lang.String filename
Currently open file name.

reader

private java.io.BufferedReader reader
Input file readed.

recoveryFileStream

private java.io.DataOutputStream recoveryFileStream
Positions file. This file is used to recover in case of crash.

currentPosition

private long currentPosition
Current position for the open file.

shutdownHook

private java.lang.Thread shutdownHook

open

public long open(java.lang.String filename)
          throws ParserException
This method opens a file for parsing.

Parameters:
filename - the input file name
Returns:
the current file position. Usually is 0, but can be different in case of a recovery.
Throws:
ParserException - if the input file can't be found or can't be opened.
